spec_data.Name: perl-File-NCopy
spec_data.Description:
File::NCopy copies files to directories, or a single file to another
file. The functionality is very similar to cp.

Deprecated module. Use only if required by other module.
You can use File::Copy::Recursive instead.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:36:22 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Copy files to directories, or a single file to another file
